State.Author: Kezyma
State.Description: A plugin for Mod Organizer 2 that automatically exports your mod list, enabled plugins, and grass mods to OpenMW whenever you run the game through Mod Organizer.
State.Name: Kezyma's OpenMW Player for Mod Organizer 2

State.Author: OffworldDevil
State.Description: 8 new blood textures for NPCs and creatures. 1k quality.
State.Name: Diverse Blood

State.Author: GrumblingVomit
State.Description: Adds exteriors to all interior cells with windows. So far, Molag Mar, Caldera, Pelagiad, and Gnisis.
State.Name: Morrowind Interiors Project

State.Author: taitechnic
State.Description: UPDATE: Tamriel Rebuilt voiced dialogue ESP now properly supports TR release 24.12. Support mod for use by other OpenMW lua Mods only. Currently a WIP. Requires OpenMW 0.49.
State.Name: OpenMW Lua helper utility

State.Author: Xe
State.Description: Raise your shield while also attacking, improved vanilla block experience.
State.Name: Shields Up (OpenMW)

State.Author: mym
State.Description: With this mod, enemies with melee attacks will try to hide themselves if the player attacks them from a position they cannot reach.
State.Name: Take Cover (OpenMW)

State.Author: Half11
State.Description: The Publicans fixes several places in the vanilla game that were set up like inns (where you can rent rooms), but Bethesda still needed to add the option to rent a room.
State.Name: The Publicans

State.Author: mort
State.Description: Makes the Sixth House the most difficult content in the game. Intended for use with my other rebalance mods.
State.Name: Beware the Sixth House (Sixth House Overhaul)

State.Author: Half11
State.Description: This mod fixes Bethesda's overly enthusiastic expansion hooks by delaying the Dark Brotherhood attacks (for Tribunal) and limiting intrustive dialogue topics to a few NPCs (Bloodmoon).
State.Name: Expansion Delay

State.Author: Melchior Dahrk and NullCascade
State.Description: This is a modern, pluginless replacement of the old Windows Glow mods with many more features besides! Windows Glow suffered from every mod needing a patch to work with it. Glow in the Dahrk handles this automatically through the meshes themselves with a powerful code by NullCascade which can switch the visible portion of meshes on the fly.
State.Name: Glow in the Dahrk

State.Author: eledin
State.Description: Modernized Dialogue and Decluttering of the UI
State.Name: Interface Reimagined for OpenMW

State.Author: Melchior Dahrk
State.Description: Replaces all vanilla splash art for the loading screens with new, 16:9 widescreen files (newly made for this mod). Gives the same treatment to the unused Bethesda splash art. Adds new, vanilla-style splash art for many vanilla creatures.
State.Name: Loading Screens Diversified

State.Author: Project Enhance
State.Description: Upscales every in-game texture with the help of machine learning. 100% vanilla-friendly.
State.Name: Morrowind Enhanced Textures

State.Author: Project Enhance
State.Description: Upscales every in-game texture with the help of machine learning. 100% vanilla-friendly.
State.Name: Morrowind Enhanced Textures

State.Author: MOP Team
State.Description: Greatly improves performance and fixes tons of mesh errors.
State.Name: Morrowind Optimization Patch

State.Author: ZackHasACat
State.Description: Allows you to slay all your witnesses when a crime is committed, to remove the bounty. Inspired by Skyrim's system.
State.Name: No Witness - No Bounty

State.Author: TES3 Community
State.Description: Patch for Purists is an unofficial patch for The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind Game of the Year Edition which attempts to continue where the latest official version of the game left off. Over 9000+ bugs still present in the game have been fixed.
State.Name: Patch for Purists

State.Author: EpochWon
State.Description: A few OpenMW post process shaders
State.Name: Some OpenMW Post Process Shaders

State.Author: Always Hungry
State.Description: A robust user interface Lua mod that adds a configurable Actor info, various healthbars and hit chance widgets. For OpenMW 0.49
State.Name: SME - Useful Widgets - Actor Info - Health Bar - Hit Chance

State.Author: EpochWon
State.Description: A few OpenMW post process shaders
State.Name: Some OpenMW Post Process Shaders

State.Author: Cross-Project Coordination
State.Description: Culminating from a year of hard work, Tamriel_Data contains a data unified file structure spearheaded by Project Tamriel and Tamriel Rebuilt as the first adopter.
State.Name: Tamriel_Data

State.Author: Ashstaar
State.Description: Journey through the realms of Oblivion. New quests, items, characters, creatures, etc.
State.Name: The Doors of Oblivion

State.Author: Ashstaar
State.Description: Journey through the realms of Oblivion. New quests, items, characters, creatures, etc.
State.Name: The Doors of Oblivion

State.Author: PikachunoTM
State.Description: An attempt to fix the many issues present in Bethesda's original Official Plugins. Includes fixes for all of the Official Plugins, and offers merged and compatibility options as well.
State.Name: Unofficial Morrowind Official Plugins Patched

State.Author: JaceyS
State.Description: Replaces the small 16x16 spell effect icons with your choice of larger icons. Works with your choice of MWSE or OpenMW
State.Name: Big Icons

State.Author: kartoffel
State.Description: Some texture edits + mesh edits.
State.Name: Facelift for Tamriel Data

State.Author: Caleb AKA me
State.Description: An in-depth yet completely vanilla friendly touch up of every head and almost every hair (a few looked okay) in the game. Hopefully breathes new life into the character's appearances for diehard vanilla purists and people just looking for a decent upgrade to the old heads.
State.Name: Familiar Faces by Caleb (Updated)

State.Author: Von Djangos
State.Description: Certain events, usually when the player reunites friends or lovers, will now play a voiced conversation between those two NPCs.
State.Name: Friends Reunited

State.Author: Stuporstar and Greatness7
State.Description: Now works with OpenMW! MWSE Graphic Herbalism harnesses the power of lua and mesh switchnodes, allowing this mod to be run without an esp or standard scripts. This dramatically optimizes performance compared to older graphic herbalism mods. It also comes with an mod configuration menu to allow you to change settings.
State.Name: Graphic Herbalism - MWSE and OpenMW Edition

State.Author: Hemaris
State.Description: Adjusts every vanilla light mesh to enhance the effects of other shader and lighting mods. Compatible with MGE, OpenMW, ReShade, True Lights And Darkness, Enlightened Flames, and just about everything else.
State.Name: Improved Lights for All Shaders

State.Author: Hemaris
State.Description: Adjusts every vanilla light mesh to enhance the effects of other shader and lighting mods. Compatible with MGE, OpenMW, ReShade, True Lights And Darkness, Enlightened Flames, and just about everything else.
State.Name: Improved Lights for All Shaders

Original.Name: Kirel's Interior Weather (Cleaned and updated with tes3cmd)-49278-V1-0Edit-1612480362.7z

State.Author: Kirel
State.Description:
Plays weather sound effects in interior cells, but not in places like

caves, ruins, etc and places you wouldn't expect to hear them - all

with little or no FPS hit.
State.Name: Kirel's Interior Weather

State.Author: Project Enhance
State.Description: Upscales every in-game texture with the help of machine learning. 100% vanilla-friendly.
State.Name: Morrowind Enhanced Textures

State.Author: Project Enhance
State.Description: Upscales every in-game texture with the help of machine learning. 100% vanilla-friendly.
State.Name: Morrowind Enhanced Textures

Original.Name: Morrowind Quest Redux All in One-54060-2-2-2-1736198921.7z

State.Author: Kildozery
State.Description:
A lightweight and vanilla-friendly revisit of many of Morrowind's questlines. This series aims to make them a more rewarding and enjoyable experience to play, whilst holding true to vanilla's vision. 



This page collects all of my separate Redux mods into a single place for ease of installation.
State.Name: Morrowind Quests Redux

State.Author: OAAB_Data Team
State.Description: OAAB_Data is a free-to-use asset repository for the Morrowind Community.
State.Name: OAAB_Data

State.Author: OAAB_Data Team
State.Description: OAAB_Data is a free-to-use asset repository for the Morrowind Community.
State.Name: OAAB_Data

State.Author: Skooma Lover
State.Description: OMW Achievements - a mod that adds the ability to get achievements to the game. There is support for the adding your own achievements (OpenMW 0.49+ required).
State.Name: OMW Achievements

State.Author: Epoch
State.Description: Adds distortion effects to all particles and spells where it seems appropriate.
State.Name: OpenMW (0.49) Distortion Effects

State.Author: akortunov and CemKey
State.Description:
Based on MW Containers Animated by qqqbbb.

This mod adds open/close animation and sounds to all containers that should have animation.

Uses a native animated containers support feature from OpenMW 0.46 or newer.
State.Name: OpenMW Containers Animated

Original.Name: Improved Lights for All Shaders Patch-55032-1-0-1722198456.zip

State.Author: Epoch
State.Description: Patches for other mods to use distortion effects
State.Name: OpenMW Distortion Effects Patches

State.Author: taitechnic
State.Description: UPDATE: Scripted Dialogue Animations for Modders. Unpaused dialogue with dynamic camera control, and enhanced Idle animations for NPC's. Customize player Idle animation, or use playlist function to animate player in any pose on demand.
State.Name: OpenMW Dynamic Actors

State.Author: taitechnic
State.Description: Now under a new name! NEW : Floating dust in tombs and crypts. This mod adds ambient visuals: Smoking candles, lightning strikes, moths around lanterns, and more.
State.Name: OpenMW Dynamic Ambient Visual Effects

State.Author: taitechnic
State.Description: MWSE Skyrim Style Quest Notifications by nazz190, modified for use in OpenMW. Adds popup notifications when you start or finish a quest, in the style of Skyrim. Requires OpenMW 0.49 or later.
State.Name: OpenMW Skyrim Style Quest Notifications

Original.Name: OpenMW Voices of Vvardenfell patch All Dialogue-54137-0-54-1741295102.zip

State.Author: taitechnic
State.Description: NEW version for Full Working of Kezyma's Voices of Vvardenfell, all dialogue now playable. OpenMW 0.49 only.
State.Name: OpenMW Voices of Vvardenfell patch

State.Author: Qlonever
State.Description: An OpenMW lua mod aiming to make leveling up less bothersome while retaining player choice.
State.Name: Potential Character Progression (OpenMW)

State.Author: Project Atlas Team
State.Description: The goal of Project Atlas is to identify the most performance heavy areas of vanilla Morrowind and some popular mods and target high usage/strain meshes in those areas for atlasing. This effort involves reworking the UVs for those meshes and creating texture atlases to cover various sets.
State.Name: Project Atlas

State.Author: kindi
State.Description: Guards protect against hostile NPCs.
State.Name: Protective Guards (OpenMW)

State.Author: Max Yari
State.Description:
No more junky floaty first-person combat animations.

A mix of new, altered vanilla, and adjusted MCAR animations.
State.Name: ReAnimations - first-person animation pack

State.Author: Aksenty
State.Description: 400+ icons for the Skyrim Style Quest Notifications.
State.Name: Skyrim Style Quest Notifications - Legendary Edition

State.Author: Tamriel Rebuilt Team
State.Description: Tamriel Rebuilt is a fan project working to build the mainland of Morrowind Province in The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind, while preserving the original game’s creative vision and direction.
State.Name: Tamriel Rebuilt

Original.Name: Vanilla Style HD Icons for Attributes and Skills-54708-2-1741286172.zip

State.Author: kotbaioun
State.Description: New vanilla-looking HD icons for all attributes and skills.
State.Name: Vanilla Style HD Icons for Attributes and Skills

State.Author: TES3 Community
State.Description: Makes unreadied weapons appear on the character's hip or back.
State.Name: Weapon Sheathing

State.Author: Remiros
State.Description: Adds sheaths to weapons that previously didn't have any
State.Name: Weapon Sheathing Additions

State.Author: MorleyDev
State.Description: Adds floating hit & miss indicators (with damage dealth or hit chance percentage shown) to provide players feedback for when a melee swing hits/misses and the damage/odds of the swing
State.Name: (OpenMW) Hit and Miss Percentage Indicators for Melee Combat

State.Author: eMOElein
State.Description: A configurable framework that provides support for situation specific custom ambient music.
State.Name: Dynamic Music (OpenMW Only)

State.Author: kartoffel
State.Description: Some texture edits + mesh edits.
State.Name: Facelift for Tamriel Data

State.Author: mym
State.Description:
NPCs and creatures now have means to heal themselves and their partners.

This is done dynamically for any vanilla or added actor, if they meet specific criteria.

Works with combat teams and with followers.

Fair Care increases most fights difficulty, but can also help the player, as some of his followers will now be able to heal him.
State.Name: Fair Care (OpenMW)

State.Author: mym
State.Description: Fresh Loot dynamically improves random weapons, armors and clothing, by altering their properties or adding enchantments. Loots get more exciting and enemies more challenging. This mod supports over 3500 items types and 60.000 modifications applied to those items.
State.Name: Fresh Loot (OpenMW)

State.Author: Von Djangos
State.Description: Makes the reveal and death of Dagoth Gares more cinematic, using custom voices and animations.
State.Name: Gares Last Gasp

State.Author: Stuporstar and Greatness7
State.Description: Now works with OpenMW! MWSE Graphic Herbalism harnesses the power of lua and mesh switchnodes, allowing this mod to be run without an esp or standard scripts. This dramatically optimizes performance compared to older graphic herbalism mods. It also comes with an mod configuration menu to allow you to change settings.
State.Name: Graphic Herbalism - MWSE and OpenMW Edition

State.Author: Von Djangos
State.Description: Adds conversations between NPCs using ElevenAI.
State.Name: Immersive Morrowind

State.Author: Kezyma - tewlwolow
State.Description: A project to fully voice Morrowind using ElevenAI and MWSE. Comes with an optional 'greetings-only' mode and is easily extensible to add compatibility with other mods with no knowledge of scripting or the CS and no additional esp.
State.Name: Kezyma's Voices of Vvardenfell

State.Author: GrumblingVomit
State.Description: Adds exteriors to all interior cells with windows. So far, Molag Mar, Caldera, Pelagiad, and Gnisis.
State.Name: Morrowind Interiors Project

State.Author: Tyddy
State.Description: Only for using with Tamriel Rebuilt Project. New, Better. Detailed. Textures for Necrom, Saint City of the Dead Ones.
State.Name: Necrom - Arkitektora of Morrowind

State.Author: Tyddy
State.Description: Only for using with Tamriel Rebuilt Project. New, Better. Detailed. Textures for Necrom, Saint City of the Dead Ones.
State.Name: Necrom - Arkitektora of Morrowind

State.Author: taitechnic
State.Description: Adds visual effects and sounds when you hit objects in the world. For OpenMW 0.49 development version.
State.Name: OpenMW Impact Effects

State.Author: MwGek
State.Description: Adds icons for faction quests and location specific icons for the misc quests.
State.Name: Project Cyrodiil - SSQN Patch

State.Author: Von Djangos - ElevenAI - Original Morrowind voice actors
State.Description: ElevenAI generated voices for quest-giving NPCs in Morrowind. Currently adds over 1400 original lines of voiced dialogue using the original actors voices. Works with openmw!
State.Name: Quest Voice Greetings

State.Author: Kildozery
State.Description: Scornfully Wielded Insults and Taunts (S.W.I.T) adds over 120 lines of newly voiced dialogue, utilising ElevenAI and the voices of the original Morrowind voice actors.
State.Name: Scornfully Wielded Insults and Taunts (SWIT)

State.Author: Kildozery
State.Description: Sincerely Expressed Recognition and Accolades (S.E.R.A) adds over 60 lines of newly voiced dialogue, utilising ElevenAI and the voices of the original Morrowind voice actors.
State.Name: Sincerely Expressed Recognition and Accolades (SERA)

State.Author: Rytelier and ASKII
State.Description: Adds whole new soundtrack for Tamriel Rebuilt areas, with region based music, dungeons, cities and other.
State.Name: Tamriel Rebuilt - Original Soundtrack

State.Author: Von Djangos
State.Description: Enables over 100 lines of voiced dialogue for shopkeepers that were shipped with the original game but never used.
State.Name: Great Service

State.Author: Von Djangos
State.Description: Adds over 200 new voice entries for NPCs, mostly using edited original voice files.
State.Name: Idle Talk

State.Author: S9T9K
State.Description:
Adds fully AI-voiced dialogue to AFFresh. Covers all playable races and even one creature. 

Beta release focused on testing quality and gathering feedback.
State.Name: AFFresh - Fully Voiced

State.Author: S9T9K
State.Description: Adds fully AI-voiced dialogue to the latest release of Tamriel Rebuilt. Covers all original playable races. New TR races and creatures with dialogue will be voiced in a later update.
State.Name: Tamriel Rebuilt - Grasping Fortune - Fully Voiced

State.Author: Cepko
State.Description: The Tamriel Rebuilt Voices mod is here to enhance the immersive journey of the Tamriel Rebuilt mod for The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind by providing voices to all NPCs on the mainland.
State.Name: Tamriel Rebuilt Voices

State.Author: Many people
State.Description: A postprocess shader pack for OpenMW, making it look better than ever before while still being very Vanilla-friendly
State.Name: Rafael's Shader Pack

State.Author: Kynesifnar
State.Description: Fixes the bonelord's left forearms so that they are actually positioned correctly, rather than clipping through the upper arms and disconnected from their hands.
State.Name: Fixed Bonelord Arms

State.Author: Roschl
State.Description: This mod adds a quest menu that displays all quests. The menu can be opened by pressing the X key. Clicking on a quest reveals the journal entries associated with that quest.
State.Name: OpenMW Quest Menu

State.Author: ZackHasaCat
State.Description: OpenMW 0.48 or newer required. Allows the player to have multiple marked locations. Very configurable, uses lua to allow marking of any location.
State.Name: Zack's Lua Multimark Mod

State.Author: Jonado
State.Description: Expansion of the mod "Diverse Blood" to cover all creatures in Tamriel Data, Tamriel Rebuilt, Project Cyrodiil, and Skyrim: Home of the Nords.
State.Name: Diverse Blood for Tamriel Rebuilt and Project Tamriel

State.Author: mort
State.Description:
This mod is intended to rebalance the Tribunal expansion in a variety of ways, most importantly by editing the stats of creatures and npcs.

This mod rebalances Tribunal as if it shipped with Morrowind.
State.Name: Tribunal Rebalance

State.Author: mym
State.Description: Fresh Loot dynamically improves random weapons, armors and clothing, by altering their properties or adding enchantments. Loots get more exciting and enemies more challenging. This mod supports over 3500 items types and 60.000 modifications applied to those items.
State.Name: Fresh Loot (OpenMW)

State.Author: mym
State.Description:
HBFS is a mod that allows you to change Morrowind's difficulty by various simple means.

It is done dynamically for all vanilla or added actors (NPCs or creatures).

Settings are provided to adjust the mod to your taste, including player level scaling options, and can be changed any time during a playthrough.
State.Name: Harder Better Faster Stronger (OpenMW)

State.Author: Tamriel Rebuilt Team
State.Description: Tamriel Rebuilt is a fan project working to build the mainland of Morrowind Province in The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind, while preserving the original game’s creative vision and direction.
State.Name: Tamriel Rebuilt

State.Author: Vegetto
State.Description: Nord's windows have a wooden shutter, open in the day and closed at night.
State.Name: Nords shut your windows

State.Author: therealralts
State.Description: Adds working keytars, and lets you and followers play them!
State.Name: Keytars (OpenMW)

State.Author: mort
State.Description:
This mod is intended to rebalance the Bloodmoon expansion in a variety of ways, most importantly by editing the stats of creatures and npcs.

This mod rebalances Bloodmoon as if it shipped with Morrowind.
State.Name: Bloodmoon Rebalance

State.Author: mym
State.Description: Fresh Loot dynamically improves random weapons, armors and clothing, by altering their properties or adding enchantments. Loots get more exciting and enemies more challenging. This mod supports over 3500 items types and 60.000 modifications applied to those items.
State.Name: Fresh Loot (OpenMW)

State.Author: maxar
State.Description: Time your attacks! Charge to boost weapon skills and improve hit chances. Find the sweet spot – overcharging reduces the bonus.
State.Name: Maxar's Timed Attacks (OpenMw 0.49)

State.Author: urm
State.Description: Shows your current crime status in a HUD overlay reminiscent of open world crime games, such as GTA or Cyberpunk.
State.Name: Most Wanted Nerevarine

Original.Name: Protective Guards - Factions and NPCs Protections-54858-1-4-1746481983.zip

State.Author: kuyondo and lelimule
State.Description: This mod is an improvement of Protective Guards. Now the guards don't systematically protect the player; it depends of the guard/attacker/defensor faction, and possibly of attacker/defensor rank, and possibly if attacker/defensor is a guard or not. Furthermore, guards can protect NPCs too (example: if a NPC attacks another NPC), with the same rules
State.Name: Protective Guards - Factions and NPCs Protections (OpenMW)

State.Author: mort
State.Description:
This mod is intended to rebalance the Bloodmoon expansion in a variety of ways, most importantly by editing the stats of creatures and npcs.

This mod rebalances Bloodmoon as if it shipped with Morrowind.
State.Name: Bloodmoon Rebalance

Original.Name: Morrowind Quest Redux All in One-54060-2-2-3-1746550181.7z

State.Author: Kildozery
State.Description:
A lightweight and vanilla-friendly revisit of many of Morrowind's questlines. This series aims to make them a more rewarding and enjoyable experience to play, whilst holding true to vanilla's vision. 



This page collects all of my separate Redux mods into a single place for ease of installation.
State.Name: Morrowind Quests Redux

Original.Name: Protective Guards - Factions and NPCs Protections-54858-1-3-1737716111.zip

State.Author: kuyondo and lelimule
State.Description: This mod is an improvement of Protective Guards. Now the guards don't systematically protect the player; it depends of the guard/attacker/defensor faction, and possibly of attacker/defensor rank, and possibly if attacker/defensor is a guard or not. Furthermore, guards can protect NPCs too (example: if a NPC attacks another NPC), with the same rules
State.Name: Protective Guards - Factions and NPCs Protections (OpenMW)

State.Author: mort
State.Description:
This mod is intended to rebalance the Bloodmoon expansion in a variety of ways, most importantly by editing the stats of creatures and npcs.

This mod rebalances Bloodmoon as if it shipped with Morrowind.
State.Name: Bloodmoon Rebalance

State.Author: Aphain
State.Description:
Makes pickpocketing useful by:



1) Setting the maximum success chance to 100% (previously, no matter how good you were, you could always fail a pickpocket test)

2) Changing the fPickPocketMod modifer from 0,3 to 0,05 (this makes pickpocketing actually useful and allows you to steal valuable/heavy items with enough Sneak/Luck)
State.Name: Pickpocket Rebalance (OpenMW)

State.Author: ProvinceCyrodiil
State.Description: PRE-ALPHA. Located between the great ports of Cyrodiil, Hammerfell, Valenwood and Summerset, the isle of Stirk offers a safe harbor to the many trade ships that sail on the wide Abecean Sea. Though poor and provincial compared to the mighty cities of Cyrodiil, the island thrives on passing trade and the rich fishing grounds that surround it.
State.Name: Province Cyrodiil

State.Author: Half11
State.Description: This mod fixes another one of Beth's oversights. One of MW's quests has voiced dialogue that sends you to a totally different location than where the quest actually takes place. I just put the cave entrance in a more logical location.
State.Name: Dubdilla Location Fix

State.Author: SymphonyTeam
State.Description:
Small patch for NPC and Player.

This patch is reduces the size for BoundBoxes of all NPC.

+ male.

+ female.

+ beast races

+ optional tweak for animation

+ background for player into menu mode

Now they are haven't get the jamming in narrow places.
State.Name: Jammings off

State.Author: ProvinceCyrodiil
State.Description: PRE-ALPHA. Located between the great ports of Cyrodiil, Hammerfell, Valenwood and Summerset, the isle of Stirk offers a safe harbor to the many trade ships that sail on the wide Abecean Sea. Though poor and provincial compared to the mighty cities of Cyrodiil, the island thrives on passing trade and the rich fishing grounds that surround it.
State.Name: Province Cyrodiil

State.Author: johnnyhostile
State.Description: Ammo autoequip while bow/crossbow/thrown weapon readied. It will remember and prefer last hand-picked ammo if pressing Alt while equipping it. An OpenMW-Lua port of Abot's original.
State.Name: Smart Ammo for OpenMW-Lua

State.Author: Many people
State.Description: A postprocess shader pack for OpenMW, making it look better than ever before while still being very Vanilla-friendly
State.Name: Rafael's Shader Pack

State.Author: Epoch
State.Description: Patches for other mods to use distortion effects
State.Name: OpenMW Distortion Effects Patches

State.Author: MisterFlames
State.Description: Better HUD for OpenMW 0.48, many different flavors (compass, vanilla, compact, skyrim-like)
State.Name: Simple HUD for OpenMW (with compass or minimap)

State.Author: SHOTN Team
State.Description: 100+ quests, including new regional questlines for the Imperial Guilds, bounty hunting, and miscellaneous quests; 290+ exterior cells of hand-crafted landscape; 330+ interior cells, including the massive cities of Karthwasten and Dragonstar, towns, camps, and dozens of locations for you to loot in classic TES fashion.
State.Name: Skyrim Home Of The Nords

State.Author: GrumblingVomit
State.Description: Makes the mesh underneath Ebon Tower larger so it renders from farther away in OpenMW.
State.Name: Distant Ebon Tower for OpenMW

State.Author: Kildozery
State.Description: Lore Accurate Artifacts changes a number of Morrowind's artifacts to better reflect their descriptions contained within Tamrielic Lore.
State.Name: Lore Accurate Artifacts

State.Author: AFFA
State.Description: Adds about 30 low-level quests to Seyda Neen, Balmora, and a particular category of people.
State.Name: AFFresh

State.Author: mort
State.Description:
This mod is intended to rebalance the Tribunal expansion in a variety of ways, most importantly by editing the stats of creatures and npcs.

This mod rebalances Tribunal as if it shipped with Morrowind.
State.Name: Tribunal Rebalance

State.Author: urm
State.Description: Follower HUD and teleportation
State.Name: Attend Me

State.Author: Hrnchamd
State.Description: Adds interactive placement, rotation and wall mounting of items. Arrange gear, books and anything else you can pick up. Requires MWSE 2.1.
State.Name: Perfect Placement

State.Author: Denis418
State.Description: Rescue a slave and help him reach Old Ebonheart.
State.Name: Tamriel Rebuilt Introduction Quest - Help a Khajiit reach the City of Good People

State.Author: Dirane Me
State.Description:
>Just walking animations

>Optional Run Animations

>Optional Weapon Sheathing Animations

"NEW FIRST PERSON WEAPON SHEATHING DRAW ANIMATIONS"
State.Name: Simply Walking (Remastered)

State.Author: Denis418
State.Description: Rescue a slave and help him reach Old Ebonheart.
State.Name: Tamriel Rebuilt Introduction Quest - Help a Khajiit reach the City of Good People

Original.Name: Lua helper Dialogue ESP for Patch for Purists 4.02-54629-0-52-1738185651.zip

State.Author: taitechnic
State.Description: UPDATE: Tamriel Rebuilt voiced dialogue ESP now properly supports TR release 24.12. Support mod for use by other OpenMW lua Mods only. Currently a WIP. Requires OpenMW 0.49.
State.Name: OpenMW Lua helper utility

State.Author: S9T9K
State.Description:
Adds fully AI-voiced dialogue to AFFresh. Covers all playable races and even one creature. 

Beta release focused on testing quality and gathering feedback.
State.Name: AFFresh - Fully Voiced

Original.Name: Lua helper Dialogue ESP Tamriel Rebuilt 25.05.03-54629-0-56-1746314330.zip

State.Author: taitechnic
State.Description: UPDATE: Tamriel Rebuilt voiced dialogue ESP now properly supports TR release 24.12. Support mod for use by other OpenMW lua Mods only. Currently a WIP. Requires OpenMW 0.49.
State.Name: OpenMW Lua helper utility

State.Author: Vegetto
State.Description: OpenMW Water Shaders with dynamic caustics, water foam, volumetric light rays, and realistic fog effects.
State.Name: OpenMW Water Shader Enhanced (OWSE)

Original.Name: 1_All Races and Classes Unlocked - Vanilla and TD-53710-3-0-1746167245.7z

State.Author: TinyPlesiosaur
State.Description: Enables all vanilla NPC classes, all Tamriel_Data classes, and all Tamriel_Data races at character creation.
State.Name: All Races and Classes Unlocked - Vanilla and Tamriel_Data

State.Author: SHOTN Team
State.Description: 100+ quests, including new regional questlines for the Imperial Guilds, bounty hunting, and miscellaneous quests; 290+ exterior cells of hand-crafted landscape; 330+ interior cells, including the massive cities of Karthwasten and Dragonstar, towns, camps, and dozens of locations for you to loot in classic TES fashion.
State.Name: Skyrim Home Of The Nords

State.Author: Uploader
State.Description: Faster projectiles and/or magic missiles, higher recovery chance, weightless arrows. Pick and choose.
State.Name: Projectile Overhaul - Modular

State.Author: AFFA
State.Description: For the Winter Modjam 2025. Frik is concerned about one Wilhelm Bear-Star who may be harassing Tribunal pilgrims. Find Wilhelm and see if he's divinely inspired or a madman.
State.Name: Wilhelm of the Aedra

State.Author: Hemaris
State.Description: Vivec and Molag Mar no longer look like empty water on the global map.
State.Name: Cantons on the Global Map

State.Author: Hemaris
State.Description: Extends the seafloor around Vvardenfell to hide the edge of the world in OpenMW. Compatible with everything.
State.Name: Distant Seafloor for OpenMW

State.Author: ModManSam
State.Description:
Add reputation gain to Fighters Guild, Imperial Legion and Thieves Guild quests.



Most faction questlines reward you with reputation, but it's mysteriously missing from the fighter's guild, imperial legion and thieves guild. This mod aims to rectify this oversight.
State.Name: Reputation Fixes

State.Author: Aphain
State.Description: Makes leveling speechcraft a better and worthwhile experience. Talk your way to the top!
State.Name: Speechcraft Rebalance (OpenMW)

State.Author: MisterFlames
State.Description: Carefully tweaked values to increase speed and carry weight. Fatigue-management overhauled. No more quickly burning through stamina while running, but fatigue is still a factor.
State.Name: Fatigue and Speed and Carryweight Rebalance (OpenMW)

State.Author: levanesque
State.Description: Makes the Barristers Guild in Tamriel Data into a joinable faction, with an epic, story-driven quest chain centered in Tamriel Rebuilt's Old Ebonheart.
State.Name: Barristers Guild - Old Ebonheart Questline
